title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Evolution and Application Strategies of Competency-Based Educational Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components and historical development of competency-based education models.
Learners can diagnose the current status of competency application in educational settings using document analysis and survey methods.

Learners can propose strategies to address potential issues (e.g., lack of teacher expertise, inadequate assessment systems) in designing competency-based curricula specialized for language education.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
